mystory.title: my story
mystory.summary: Russian, Spanish, computer engineer, web developer
mystory.text: I am Daniil Teterevkov. Born in Khabarovsk, Russia on 16th July 1994. When I was only 5 years old I moved with my parents to Buenos Aires, Argentina. Then again, when I was 11 years old we moved again to Barcelona, Catalonia. My live was already crazy at such young age but I am glad all that happened because it made me person I am today. So welcome to my resume, I wish you enjoy it and think deeply your next phone call, because it may be me, or it may be not, but then I guess, you'd lose a great worker!
